Saline nasal spray: A saline nasal spray can help to clear out mucus and relieve congestion, providing instant relief.
Honey and lemon: Mixing honey and lemon in warm water can help soothe a sore throat and reduce coughing.
Steam inhalation: Inhaling steam from a hot shower or a bowl of hot water can help to break up mucus and relieve congestion.
Zinc lozenges: Zinc lozenges can help to reduce the duration and severity of a cold by preventing the virus from replicating in the throat.
Vitamin C supplements: Taking high doses of vitamin C supplements can help boost the immune system and reduce the severity of cold symptoms.
